Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory678.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary 1', 3: "Don't go! Stay away from those employees!", 4: '1'}
{3: "Just as everyone is about to leave, two mercenaries suddenly rush down the stairs from the other side, blocking the group's path."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "The employees? What's wrong with them?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary Staff', 3: "What's wrong with them? Can't you see? Those butterflies and monsters never touch the employees—they're only targeting us!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Upon hearing these words, those who were originally willing to cooperate stop in their tracks, distancing themselves from the employees.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dejected Employee C', 3: "Aren't you the ones behind all of this?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mercenary 2', 3: 'Stop pinning the blame on us! Go ask that girl with you, the one always holding a paintbrush!', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Mercenary 2', 3: "Anyone who crossed her got beaten up by that custom-made robot of hers. The injuries didn't look serious at first, but then they'd start feeling sick, and none of them lasted more than three days before dying.", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Mercenary 3', 3: "That can't be right... I've met that robot—she seemed nice enough. She even let me in on a secret, saying she was on the hunt for the mastermind behind these monsters. Didn't the girl mention any of that to you?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "No, she didn't. Let's go ask her.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: '...What do you want to know?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yuko stands behind the crowd that has yet to evacuate, maintaining her usual listless demeanor.'}
{3: 'Even in a direct conversation, her gaze stays locked on the shadows, vigilant for any red butterflies that may flutter into view.'}
{2: "You've met Cradle before... right?", 3: '28'}
{2: "Did she tell you... that we're the ones who trapped you here? That we're responsible for all of this?", 3: '30'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: '...Yes, I did hear something like that.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Darcie', 3: 'Huh? When did you...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Barley', 3: "Do you have any ******* idea what we've been through here?! And you're trying to play innocent right off the bat?!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: "The enraged youth swings his blood-stained fist at you, but before he can even register what's happening, his body is pinned firmly in a twisted manner to the ground."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Of course we know what you've been through! That's exactly why Commandant rushed here, risking personal health to save you!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Those Hetero-Creatures infested by the butterflies... do they look friendly to you? Cradle is intimidating you.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Barley', 3: "Aren't you doing the same thing now?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "That's because you attacked us first. If we truly meant harm, or if we really wanted to intimidate you into doing something...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lucia tightens her grip, drawing a sharp cry of pain from the young man.'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: "Commandant doesn't even need to do anything. I can handle it right now, by myself.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: '...Let Barley go...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yuko Kirishima', 3: "Please let him go... We'll listen to what you have to say.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory920.jpg'}
{1: 'Inver-Hetero Tower Core Level'}
{3: 'Chaos stands at a distance from the core, head bowed as Vonnegut implants minuscule Hetero crystals from his palm into the deteriorating parts of her body.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'These are just temporary fixes with some additional defensive measures to let you approach the core.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Under no circumstances should you engage Cradle once more in your current state.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'Is it possible? The "fruit" acts as a two-way connection, giving her control over me as well. Once I leave the Inver-Hetero Tower...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Then don't leave.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: "Cradle will be here soon. She's running out of time—she'll certainly try to seize the core while she can still move.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Make your own survival the priority.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'And then what? Will you kill her?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "No. You're not ready yet to handle Agent Zero's authority and replace Cradle.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: "...Because my consciousness isn't...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'He withdraws his hands and gazes at the core before him with emotionless eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Do you know why I chose the abandoned and the clones to make the "Key", despite the risk of Chaos\' unstable consciousness?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Because Babylonia offers no place for such people.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'In my countless attempts to correct diverging timelines, I once used <color=#ff4e4eff>the original you</color>... Yet, neither side would relent. At those times, your primary goal would shift toward "returning home" rather than seeking the future.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Naturally, you may harbor hatred towards me, towards Lithos... You could do the very same thing when you first entered the Inver-Hetero Tower...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'Not anymore.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'That would only waste what few chances I have left. Even if I were to kill you, it would have to wait until everything is over.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Chaos clenches their fists, eyes burning with frustration.'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: "...Why do others have to sacrifice themselves to complete my consciousness? Why... why am I the only one who can't do it...!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Creating the "Key" from human consciousness was never possible to begin with. Your very birth is a miracle itself.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: '...After all, this isn\'t the future where the "Key" can be properly created—at best, we can merely generate a "replica."', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'The same applies to Agent Zero—until she reclaims the Hetero Tower core, she remains bound by both her current body and the "Cradle" personality.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "And now... the fruit you've planted has become another of her constraints. All of this is buying us time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'And time is exactly what we need.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Vonnegut reaches out his hand to measure Chaos' current height, met with nothing but her contemptuous glare."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'To have grown this tall... considering all the instances of time rewind, it must have been about six or seven years by now.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: "Once you undergo further completions and become capable of accepting Agent Zero's authority... your physical form will grow even larger.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'At that point, you would retain Agent Zero\'s authority while possessing enough consciousness stability to override "her" instincts that drive her to fulfill her predestined mission... That was my initial plan.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'Had Cradle not been persistently destroying the Inver-Hetero Tower, we would have had enough time.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'But at least, you now have a way to keep her in check, preventing her from freely manipulating the Red Tide.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'From here on, we can only place our hopes in Lucia and that commandant to complete you ahead of schedule.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vonnegut', 3: 'I hope those two can discern the true adversary during their stay in Constellia.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She yearns to speak her thoughts, to tear this agent before her into shreds, to avert the impending tragedy.'}
{3: 'Yet she remains silent—she has witnessed the truth with her own eyes, personally confirmed the unchangeable reality.'}
{3: "Though she cannot agree with all of Vonnegut's plans, right now, this thorn-laden tightrope represents the sole path to the future—one misstep would plunge all of humanity into the abyss."}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: '...Lucia\'s "Key" is nearly depleted. If Cradle destroys it again, she won\'t even be able to return safely to the Inver-Hetero Tower.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The ever-reserved agent offers no answer to Chaos.'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'Vonnegut.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The doll calls out his name, her voice like an echoing lament.'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: "...If things continue to go as Cradle wishes, if we can't find any way to turn this around...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Chaos', 3: 'Tell me... do you have any backup plans at all?', 4: '2'}
